name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Luther HEARD a/k/a Luther Head

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Luther HEARD a/k/a Luther Head.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Daniel H. Greene, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Robert Casey, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 746
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Luther HEARD a/k/a Luther Head.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 29, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
Daniel H. Greene, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Robert Casey, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
